00016 class QString;
00023 template<class function_type>
00024         class CustomFunctionBase {
00025     public:
00026         CustomFunctionBase(): handle (NULL) {}
00028         ~CustomFunctionBase() { if (handle) dlclose (handle); }
00029         QString symbolic ();
00030 
00032         bool isValid() const { return valid; }
00033 
00034     protected:
00035         bool loadFunction (const QString &, QString = "f");
00036 
00038         void setValid() { valid = true; }
00040         void setInvalid() { valid = false; }
00041 
00043         function_type *func;
00044 
00045     private:
00046         void *handle;   
00047         bool valid;     
00048 };

00117 template<class function_type>
00118         bool CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::loadFunction(const QString &libName, QString funcName) {
00119     const char *error;
00120 
00121     handle = dlopen (libName.toStdString().c_str(), RTLD_LAZY);
00122     if (!handle) {
00123         std::cerr << "Error opening library: " << dlerror() << std::endl;
00124         return false;
00125     }
00126 
00127     func = (function_type *)dlsym(handle, funcName.toStdString().c_str());
00128     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00129         std::cerr << "Error finding function: " << error << std::endl;
00130         return false;
00131     }
00132 
00133     return true;
00134 }
00135 
00137 template<class function_type>
00138         QString CustomFunctionBase<function_type>::symbolic () {
00139     typedef char* STRING;
00140     STRING (*sym)();
00141     sym = (STRING (*)())dlsym(handle, "symbolic");
00142     const char *error;
00143     static char *ret;
00144 
00145     if ((error = dlerror()) != NULL)  {
00146         std::cerr << "Error finding symbolic description in " << error << std::endl;
00147         return QString ("something");
00148     }
00149     ret=(*sym)();
00150     return QString (ret);
00151 }
